abstract: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has further slashed its stake in the Constellation Energy Group after backing away from a possible bidding war for the company, Reuters reports.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has further slashed its stake in the Constellation Energy Group after backing away from a possible bidding war for the company, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Buffett Pares Back Stake in Constellation
